Description: Do you have the courage to relive the worst game of all time? If yes, then you're in luck - the company Nintendo and TECMO KOEI GAMES republish one of the worst games of the legendary Project Zero series exclusively for the console Wii. Game Project Zero 2: Wii Edition will please fans of innovative gameplay with motion sensor and mode for 2 players. The sisters, twins Mio and Mayu Amakura lost in the village, which was plunged into eternal twilight and that mysteriously disappeared from the map. Restless soul who lived in the village of people roaming the streets in search of the twins, which for mysterious ceremonies they have to sacrifice. The twins have vybratsya from the village. Mio is struggling to save his sister, who limps because of an injury received in childhood. It soon becomes clear that Mayu receptive to the spirit world. As it is often infused the spirit of one of the twins participating in the dark ceremony in the village. As the sisters closer to the disclosure of the terrible secret that lies behind the rituals of Shadows, in their history, there are other characters who have previously experienced a similar situation
